name: Rammus
title: the Armordillo
lore: The mysteries that surround Rammus are numerous. How did a simple creature of the desert suddenly become able to reason? How did he craft his vaunted suit of armor? What is he searching for as he crosses the Shuriman desert? One thing is for certain: trying to stop the inexorable Rammus is a fool's mission.
blurb: The mysteries that surround Rammus are numerous. How did a simple creature of the desert suddenly become able to reason? How did he craft his vaunted suit of armor? What is he searching for as he crosses the Shuriman desert? One thing is for certain: ...
allytips_0: Powerball can be used as an effective escape mechanism.
allytips_1: Using taunt on a champion by your tower can cause the tower to attack your enemy.
allytips_2: Tremors and Defensive Ball Curl can be used late in the game to obliterate towers. If you're bogged down in a team fight, it is often valuable to break off and attack the buildings.
enemytips_0: Pay particular attention to when his Defensive Ball Curl is off. Rammus has slightly lower stats than a normal tank when he's out of the stance.
enemytips_1: Rammus often stacks high Armor, leaving him especially vulnerable to caster damage while not in Defensive Ball Curl.

spells_2: {"name":"Puncturing Taunt","description":"Rammus taunts an enemy champion or monster into a reckless assault against Rammus' hard shell, reducing Armor temporarily.","sanitizedDescription":"Rammus taunts an enemy champion or monster into a reckless assault against Rammus' hard shell, reducing Armor temporarily.","tooltip":"Rammus taunts the enemy champion or monster into a reckless assault, reducing their Armor by {{ e2 }} and forcing them to attack Rammus for {{ e1 }} second(s).","sanitizedTooltip":"Rammus taunts the enemy champion or monster into a reckless assault, reducing their Armor by {{ e2 }} and forcing them to attack Rammus for {{ e1 }} second(s).","leveltip":{"label":["Armor Reduction","Duration"],"effect":["{{ e2 }} -> {{ e2NL }}","{{ e1 }} -> {{ e1NL }}"]},"image":{"full":"PuncturingTaunt.png","sprite":"spell8.png","group":"spell","x":336,"y":96,"w":48,"h":48},"resource":"{{ cost }} Mana","maxrank":5,"cost":[50,50,50,50,50],"costType":"Mana","costBurn":"50","cooldown":[12,12,12,12,12],"cooldownBurn":"12","effect":[null,[1.25,1.5,1.75,2,2.25],[5,10,15,20,25]],"effectBurn":["","1.25/1.5/1.75/2/2.25","5/10/15/20/25"],"range":[325,325,325,325,325],"rangeBurn":"325","key":"PuncturingTaunt"}
spells_3: {"name":"Tremors","description":"Rammus creates waves of destruction pulsing through the ground, causing damage to units and structures near him.","sanitizedDescription":"Rammus creates waves of destruction pulsing through the ground, causing damage to units and structures near him.","tooltip":"Rammus creates tremors beneath him, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage every second to nearby units and structures for {{ e3 }} seconds.","sanitizedTooltip":"Rammus creates tremors beneath him, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage every second to nearby units and structures for {{ e3 }} seconds.","leveltip":{"label":["Damage per Second"],"effect":["{{ e1 }} -> {{ e1NL }}"]},"image":{"full":"Tremors2.png","sprite":"spell8.png","group":"spell","x":384,"y":96,"w":48,"h":48},"resource":"{{ cost }} Mana","maxrank":3,"cost":[100,100,100],"costType":"Mana","costBurn":"100","cooldown":[60,60,60],"cooldownBurn":"60","effect":[null,[65,130,195],[100,150,200],[8,8,8]],"effectBurn":["","65/130/195","100/150/200","8"],"vars":[{"key":"a1","link":"spelldamage","coeff":[0.3]}],"range":[375,375,375],"rangeBurn":"375","key":"Tremors2"}
passive_description: Rammus gains additional damage as his shell becomes reinforced, converting 25% of his Armor into Attack Damage.
passive_sanitizedDescription: Rammus gains additional damage as his shell becomes reinforced, converting 25% of his Armor into Attack Damage.
